Admin.title: Admin
Admin.description: Represents an administrator user with elevated privileges to manage resources and assignments.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Admin entity.

name.description: The full name of the administrator.

email.description: The email address of the administrator.

Assignment.title: Assignment
Assignment.description: Represents an assignment that can be uploaded and managed by administrators.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Assignment entity.

description.description: A detailed description of the assignment.

uploadDate.description: The date and time when the assignment was uploaded.

adminId.description: Reference to the Admin who uploaded the assignment.

id.description: Unique identifier for the User entity (matches Firebase Auth UID).

email.description: The email address of the user.

/admins/{adminId}.description: Stores administrator profiles. Accessible only to authenticated admins.

/assignments/{assignmentId}.description: Stores assignment details. Includes denormalized 'adminId' for authorization, to know which admin uploaded the assignment.

/users/{userId}.description: Stores public profiles for regular users.
